name: 2022 7th International Conference on Frontiers of Signal Processing
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE. The proceedings will be submitted and reviewed by the IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. ICFSP 2022 is listed in IEEE Conference Calendar - https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/55781
